steps.name: Logged in to application as bookkeeper

elements.name: Validate BookKeeper Dashboard page

steps.name: user is on bookkeeper dashboard page
user lands on the bookkeeper dashboard page
bookkeeper dashboard page header should be "Book Keeper Dashboard"
Logged in to application as bookkeeper

elements.name: Generate Tax Relief Egress File Button is visible

steps.name: user is on bookkeeper dashboard page
verify Generate Tax Relief Egress File button should be displayed
Logged in to application as bookkeeper

elements.name: Generate Tax Relief Egress File Successfully

steps.name: user is on bookkeeper dashboard page
user click on the Generate Tax Relief Egress File button
verify the "taxrelief.txt" file is generated
Logged in to application as bookkeeper

elements.name: Check file status in db once file process is triggered

steps.name: user establish a database connection
user execute query "SELECT natid FROM working_class_heroes"
user should receive a non empty resultset
Logged in to application as bookkeeper

elements.name: Check the total count of records, if file has contents

steps.name: user is on bookkeeper dashboard page
user generated the file "taxrelief.txt"
verify the total count of records written in "taxrelief.txt" file
Logged in to application as bookkeeper

elements.name: Check the total count, if file has empty records

steps.name: user is on bookkeeper dashboard page
user generated the file "taxreliefEmpty.txt"
verify the total count of records written as 0 in "taxreliefEmpty.txt" file
user logged in to application as clerk

elements.name: Validate User lands on Clerk Dashboard page

steps.name: user is on Clerk dashboard page
user lands on the header of the clerk dashboard page
clerk dashboard page header should be "Clerk Dashboard"
user logged in to application as clerk

elements.name: Add Hero Button is visible

steps.name: user is on Clerk dashboard page
verify Add Hero button should be displayed
user logged in to application as clerk

elements.name: Upload a working record CSV File

steps.name: user is on Clerk dashboard page
user select upload a csv file from Add Hero dropdown
user upload working record csv file
user click create button
"Created Successfully!" message should be displayed
verify the count of "WORKING_CLASS_HEROES" in database table
user logged in to application as clerk

elements.name: Upload a erroneous record CSV File

steps.name: user is on Clerk dashboard page
user select upload a csv file from Add Hero dropdown
user upload erroneous record csv file
user click create button
"Unable to create hero!" message should be displayed
verify the count of "WORKING_CLASS_HEROES" in database table
user logged in to application as clerk

elements.name: Upload a CSV File with Column headers

steps.name: user is on Clerk dashboard page
user select upload a csv file from Add Hero dropdown
user upload header record csv file
user click create button
"Unable to create hero!" message should be displayed
verify the count of "WORKING_CLASS_HEROES" in database table
user logged in to application as clerk

elements.name: Upload a text file no CSV File

steps.name: user is on Clerk dashboard page
user select upload a csv file from Add Hero dropdown
user upload text file other than csv file
user click create button
"Unable to create hero!" message should be displayed
verify the count of "WORKING_CLASS_HEROES" in database table
user logged in to application as clerk

elements.name: Upload a empty record CSV File

steps.name: user is on Clerk dashboard page
user select upload a csv file from Add Hero dropdown
user upload empty record csv file
user click create button
"Created Successfully!" message should be displayed
verify the count of "WORKING_CLASS_HEROES" in database table
user logged in to application as clerk

elements.name: Add a working class hero using Add a hero page

steps.name: user is on Clerk dashboard page
verify Add Hero button should be displayed
user select Add from Add Hero dropdown
user enter the working class hero details to add hero
user click create button
"Created Successfully!" message should be displayed

name: Upload a CSV file to populate the database from UI

elements.name: Single Working Class Hero Creation

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with below details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code is 200

elements.name: Check with invalid natid where it contains aplhanumeric characters

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 400

elements.name: Check with invalid natid where it does not prefix with natid

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 400

elements.name: Check with invalid natid where the number is not inclusive

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 400

elements.name: Check with invalid name where the it includes numeric value

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 400
Response message contains "Invalid name"

elements.name: Check with invalid name where the it exceeds than allowed limit

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 400
Response message contains "Name must be between 1 and 100 characters"

elements.name: Check with invalid gender

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 400
Response message contains "Invalid gender"

elements.name: Check with future deathDate

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 500

elements.name: Check with invalid salary

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 400
Response message contains "Salary must be greater than or equals to zero"

arguments.val: "Salary must be greater than or equals to zero"

elements.name: Check with creation of Working Class Hero with nullable browniepoints and deathdate

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with nullable on browniepoints and deathdate
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code is 200

elements.name: Check with invalid taxpaid

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with invalid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code for invalid natid is 400
Response message contains "must be greater than or equal to 0"

arguments.val: "must be greater than or equal to 0"

elements.name: Check with creation of duplicate Single Working Class Hero

steps.name: headers added to payload
Make request for Single working class hero with existing natid details
Request Post action Sent To "api/v1/hero"
verify status code is should be either of 400 and 500
Response message contains "Working Class Hero of natid: natid-100001 already exists!"

arguments.val: "Working Class Hero of natid: natid-100001 already exists!"

elements.name: Check Created Working Class Hero in database

steps.name: user establish a database connection
user execute query "SELECT * FROM working_class_heroes WHERE natid = natid-100001"
user should receive a non empty resultset

name: Working Class Hero creation using API

elements.name: Check owe-money api with valid natid

steps.name: Headers added to ExternalService Request
send GET request to ExternalService "api/v1/hero/owe-money?natid=8525"
ExternalService response status code is 200
Response body contains "natid-8525" and "OWE"

elements.name: Check owe-money api with invalid natid

steps.name: Headers added to ExternalService Request
send GET request to ExternalService "api/v1/hero/owe-money?natid=abcd"
ExternalService response status code is 500
Response body contains "Internal Server Error"

elements.name: Check owe-money api with valid natid and validate its response format

steps.name: Headers added to ExternalService Request
send GET request to ExternalService "api/v1/hero/owe-money?natid=8525"
ExternalService response status code is 200
verify response body format "natid-8525" and "OWE"

elements.name: Check owe-money api with valid natid and validating its response schema structure

steps.name: Headers added to ExternalService Request
send GET request to ExternalService "api/v1/hero/owe-money?natid=8525"
ExternalService response status code is 200
verify response body schema structure "natid-8525" and "OWE"

elements.name: Login page title

steps.name: user is on login page
user gets the header of the login page
header of the login page should be "Working Class Hero System"

elements.name: Login with correct credentials

steps.name: user is on login page
user enters username "clerk"
user enters password "clerk"
user click on Submit button
user lands on the header of the clerk dashboard page
clerk dashboard page header should be "Clerk Dashboard"

elements.name: Login with invalid credentials

steps.name: user is on login page
user enters username "csk01"
user enters password "csk01"
user click on Submit button
user lands on the error message in the page
error message should be "Unable to log in successfully!"

name: Login Page of a Working Class Hero System

elements.name: Creation of Single Working Class Hero with Vouchers

steps.name: Headers added to Vouchers Request
Make request for a Single working class hero and vouchers with below details
send vouchers request to "api/v1/hero/vouchers"
verify vouchers response statuscode 200

elements.name: Check created vouchers added in database

steps.name: user execute vouchers query "SELECT * FROM vouchers WHERE name = 'VOUCHER 1'"
user should receive a non empty resultset added with vouchers

elements.name: Single Working Class Hero creation with empty Vouchers

steps.name: Headers added to Vouchers Request
Make request for a Single working class hero and empty vouchers with below details
send vouchers request to "api/v1/hero/vouchers"
verify vouchers response statuscode 400
verify response message as "vouchers cannot be null or empty"

elements.name: Check vouchers added in db, which created with invalid details.

steps.name: Headers added to Vouchers Request
Make request for a Single working class hero and vouchers with below invalid details
user execute vouchers query "SELECT * FROM vouchers WHERE name = 'VOUCHER 2'"
user should receive a non empty resultset added with vouchers

elements.name: Number of vouchers each customer has each voucher category

steps.name: Headers added to Vouchers Request
send vouchers request by person and type to "api/v1/voucher/by-person-and-type"
verify vouchers response statuscode 200
verify response body for vouchers

name: Adding Vouchers to working class heroes using API
